ingredients.content: 3 sprigs fresh coriander, stems and leaves separated
2 ½ cm fresh lemongrass, white part only
1 long green chilli, deseeded if preferred
500 g mixed vegetables (e.g. zucchini, broccoli, capsicum), cut into slices

preparations.content: Place fresh fresh ginger, garlic clove, coriander stems, lemongrass and long green chilli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then lightly sauté <b>2 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Place fish fillets onto Varoma tray and use mixture in mixing bowl to coat each fillet liberally. Set Varoma tray with coated fish aside.
Place jasmine rice into simmering basket and rinse until water runs clear. Set rice aside to drain.

Place water into mixing bowl and insert simmering basket with rice. Place mixed vegetables into Varoma dish. Insert Varoma tray with fish into Varoma dish. Cook <b>16-18 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove simmering basket and set rice aside.
Replace Varoma and steam a further <b>3-5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, until fish and vegetables are cooked to your preference.
Serve fish, rice and vegetables immediately, garnished with fresh bamboo shoots (optional).
